<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swift](/Feats.aspx?ID=2594) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sylph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=311" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 114 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You move with the wind always at your back. Your Speed increases by 5 feet.

**Special** The Speed increase from this feat isn't cumulative with any Speed increase from your ancestry feats (such as [Nimble Elf](/Feats.aspx?ID=16)).
name: Swift
